title: HttpClient
description: Represents a stateful HTTP client that can send requests and receive responses.

title: native fun send(request)
description: Sends an HTTP request and returns the response.

title: HttpRequest(method, url, headers, body)
description: Creates a new HTTP request. Recommended to use the static factory methods instead.

title: static fun create(method, url, headers, body)
description: Creates a new HTTP request with a specified method, to be sent with HttpClient.send().

title: static fun createGet(url, headers, body)
description: Creates a new HTTP GET request to be sent with HttpClient.send().

title: static fun createPost(url, headers, body)
description: Creates a new HTTP GET request to be sent with HttpClient.send().

title: HttpResponse(statusCode, headers, body)
description: Creates a new HTTP response with the given status code, headers, and body.

title: native fun _createHttpClient()
description: An HTTP client that can send requests and receive responses.
